item.title: Service Configuration
item.description: Environment Variables Name Type Default Value Description IDM_DEBUG_ADDR string IDM_DEBUG_TOKEN string IDM_DEBUG_PPROF bool false IDM_DEBUG_ZPAGES bool false IDM_LDAPS_ADDR string 127.0.0.1:9235 IDM_LDAPS_CERT string ~/.ocis/idm/ldap.crt IDM_LDAPS_KEY string ~/.ocis/idm/ldap.key IDM_DATABASE_PATH string ~/.ocis/idm/ocis.boltdb IDM_ADMIN_PASSWORD string admin
